original_text: And gazing at him, all who sat in the council saw that his face was like the face of an angel.
korean_text: 공회 중에 앉은 사람들이 다 스데반을 주목하여 보니 그 얼굴이 천사의 얼굴과 같더라

sentences.original_text: all who sat in the council saw
that his face was like the face of an angel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 얼굴이 천사의 얼굴과 같다는 것을
